charges.charge_description: 16:3372.M GAME CONSERVATION ACTS-Transport wildlife (buck antelope) killed by another in interst commerce frm Montana to New York knowing animal transported in violation of laws of State of MT, in viol of 16:3372(a)(2)(A) &; 3373(d)(2). (1s-2s)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft on probation 1 yr. Fined $5,000 ($2500 per cnt) due w/i 90 days. Pay restitution of $1,000 to Montana Dept Fish, Wildlife &; Parks, Pay spl assmt of $50. (1s-2s)

charges.charge_description: 16:3373.F GAME CONSERVATION ACTS-Conspire to engage in conduct involving sale and purchase of wildlife w/value in excess of $350 and transport in interstate commerce, in violation of 18:371 (1)

16:3372 GAME CONSERVATION ACTS-Engage in conduct involving sale and purchase of wildlife w/value in excess of $350 and attempt to transport in interstate commerce, in violation of 16:3372(a)(2)(A) and 3373(d)(1)(B) &; 18:2 (2)
